content: this super cute and easy little spider can be crocheted up quickly so you can decorate your house in no time for halloween the spiders are crocheted in the round then each leg is crocheted off of the body in one piece > this pattern is available for free 1 on > my blog for an ad-free version you > can buy the pdf **essential information** ------------------------- **difficulty** easy **skills** crochet in the round double_crochet **materials** **yarn** stylecraft special dk 8 py 295 m 323 yards per 100g 100% acrylic for one spider 1g / 3 m / 3 yards in black **hook** 3 mm us c/2 or d/3 **other supplies** sewing needle to sew in ends scissors oddment of white for the eyes **newsletter** -------------- sign up to my newsletter 2 for my latest news pattern releases and testing **questions** ------------- if you have any questions please email me on hello@ruthhaydock com **use of this pattern** ----------------------- pattern & images © ruth haydock - all rights reserved all content in this pdf pattern is the copyright and design right of ruth haydock you are not permitted to sell the written instructions or images in any way amended or as they are you are not permitted to alter this design and sell the altered pattern you may only print this pattern out for personal use you are allowed to sell completed items that you have made using this pattern but you must credit me as the designer of the pattern ruth haydock and provide a link to my website https //ruthhaydock com/ 3 **pattern queries and help** ----------- if you need help or have a question about any of my patterns please email me on hello@ruthhaydock com 1 https //ruthhaydock com/spider-decoration-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //ruthhaydock com/newsletter/ 3 https //ruthhaydock com/
